name: Pink Onion
author: Shilpa J.
description: Cozy new spot, AMAZING pizza combinations and an overall chill vibe that lets you linger on after your meal. Might have something to do with the fact that we went on a weeknight, no annoying rushed tables for an endless line of people waiting!We enjoyed our delicious pizzas with beer on tap (they also have wines on tap!) and we nibbled on amazing flavors with smiles on our faces. Note: 1 or 2 of their unique pizzas were out the night we went but otherwise it was a great experience, will return!
